ComicInfo.Title: Good Vibrations
ComicInfo.Summary:
Don gets Kat an inappropriate birthday gift.
After being callously rebuffed by Nikki during a first aid class, Cadet Velez leaves her a surprise in the CPR dummy.
Mark gets a video tape, hoping to get his housemate in the mood. Unfortunately, the tape gets her in the wrong mood.
Shelly intrudes on Dix and Chris.
Since vivacious Eura Le Purr has vamped all the male hoverbike racers and won all the races, the competing race team brings in a racer they think will be immune to Eura's charms and dirty tricks.
